EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t Miss Out On Attending Signum on February 28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
You might be asking, “What is Signum?” The word Signum is Latin for a bell tower that heralds news or signals a momentous new piece of information. On February 28, Livongo will gather preeminent healthcare speakers and visionaries in San Francisco, and I want to invite you to be a part of the conversation.
Why Should You Come? Gain insights on how leading organizations across the country are addressing chronic-condition management now and their strategies for the future. Find out answers to burning questions like “why is timing everything” and “what can Google teach us about ourselves?” Join a movement that will address our healthcare crisis and provide smarter solutions to silence noisy healthcare.
Who’s Attending? Benefits leaders from some of the most innovative U.S. companies including Amazon, Microsoft, MetLife, Walgreens, US Foods, SAP, and Target.
CEOs, Presidents, Chief Medical Officers, and other senior executives from leading healthcare organizations including Express-Scripts, Lockton, Anthem, the Biden Cancer Initiative, American Heart Association, and more.
Speakers who include:
Daniel Pink, New York Times Best-Selling Author: Sold more than two million copies of his books on work, business, and behavior.
Hemant Taneja, Managing Director of General Catalyst: One of the most successful venture capitalists in Silicon Valley and author of business best-seller Unscaled.
Mark Ganz, CEO of Cambia Health Systems: Named one of the Top 100 Most Influential People in Healthcare in 2018 by Modern Healthcare, he leads an organization that impacts more than two million people over four states.
Dr. Stephen Klasko, CEO of Jefferson Health: Earned Fast Company’s 100 Most Creative People in Business in 2018. He’s grown Jefferson Health from three hospitals earning $2.2B in 2013 to 14 hospitals earning $5.1B in 2019.
What Else is in Store?
Welcome Reception (Wednesday, February 27, 5:00-8:00 p.m.) Mix and mingle with attendees.
Premier Dinners (Thursday, February 28, 6:30 - 9:30 p.m.) Indulge at some of San Francisco’s culinary gems with fellow clients.
Product Bar (Friday, March 1, 9:00 a.m. - Noon) Check out our latest and greatest Livongo products including our latest devices and see first hand our new behavioral health solution.
Don’t miss out! To RSVP and to view the full agenda, visit livongo.com/signum
Thanks, [Your Email Signature Here]
